name: Pulsar
description:
Gameplay that Dances to Your Beat:

Prepare to be enthralled as you take center stage in this high-octane virtual reality extravaganza. Your mission? To shoot down moving targets with laser precision while grooving to the music of your choice. The game syncs seamlessly with your desktop music library, allowing you to set the perfect soundtrack to your action-packed adventure. Feel the rhythm pulse through your veins as you lock onto targets and let loose with your laser blasters.

Features:


BYOM: Bring Your Own Music, using the built in file browser select your favourite music and the game will analyze the waveform of the track and procedurally generates the beats in line with the music., No mods needed, no concerns about music licences expiring in the future.
